comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: An experiment: deposits were accepted only from residents of Manhattan and the Bronx. The first certificate was purchased with a two-dollar bill, by Clarence A. Parks, of the Bronx. Story in the New York Times, August 2, 1911: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9902E0DE1531E2...
